DocAttribute.Name: UpperBoundValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Upper bound value for the interval defining the property value. If the value is not given, it indicates an open bound (all values to be greater than or equal to LowerBoundValue).

DocAttribute.Name: LowerBoundValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Lower bound value for the interval defining the property value. If the value is not given, it indicates an open bound (all values to be lower than or equal to UpperBoundValue).

DocAttribute.Name: Unit
DocAttribute.Documentation: Unit for the upper and lower bound values, if not given, the default value for the measure type (given by the TYPE of the upper and lower bound values) is used as defined by the global unit assignment at IfcProject.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The measure type of the upper bound value shall be the same as the measure type of the lower bound value, if both (upper and lower bound) are given.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the upper bound, or the lower bound, or both bounds shall be given.
